name: The Devil You're Dealt
description:
The Devil You're dealt is a short game with horror elements based on the Irish Folktale of the Hellfire Club. You play as Saoirse who is trying to find her parents after they didn't return home from their night shift. You will have to avoid demons, battle satanic cultists and challenge the devil himself to a game of cards.

The Inspiration

In the original tale of the hellfire club, it is said that a stranger came to club one night to play a game of cards. After winning hand after hand, the patrons grew suspicious. The stranger dropped one of his cards and before he could pick it up one of the players at the table bent down to get it. When he looked at the strangers feet he noticed they were cloven hoofs. The player shot up and screamed in terror. The stranger then shifted into his true form and dispersed in a ball of flames setting the club alight. 

We've taken a lot of liberties with the original story and used elements to create the experience we are presenting to you. If you would like more in-depth information about the club you can view it here

Controls

  • W, A, S, D  - Move
  • Shift + W,A,S,D - Run
  • LMB - Shoot (When ability is acquired)

Controller Support

Unfortunately we don't have any controllers to test with at the moment, you can try and re-map the controls in game but do so at your own risk.

Content Warning

  • Mild Gore
  • Satanic References
  • Slightly offensive language
